--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Azureblade: Laughable. How could you guys have held for so long?
> 
> He transformed again, this time into a cybertronian jetfighter, His
> speed increasing to be almost unbearable. If the rockets could follow
> that...
> 
> He swerved, facing once again the minions, and let loose a volley of
> his own missiles as well as a few shots of his cannon.

OOC: The minion and Animus are not quite together. Animus is close to
the ground, the minion is much higher up. 

Azureblade is able to outrun the rockets of the minion. The rockets
eventually loose power and fall away, leaving the Decepticon some
distance away. 

"This is foolishness." He shook his head in derision. "You run from
battle even as you call us weak?" Gripping his sword in both hands he
stands his ground as the full brunt of the firepower converges on him
and detonates explosively. When the light and smoke clears there is
another crater, but in the middle of it Animus still stands, apparently
protected by some shield of power. "Face me Decepticon!" His voice
carries over the distance. "Your antics are tiresome!" With a
deliberate motion he directs his sword at Azureblade he fires a blast
of power at him!

Preston
(Animus)
